1606080511_134skDNbvpgm7WpAjiJzbc6dQEfBa.body:
The two extremes of both worlds are clashing in this post together - you as a concerned citizen who is talking freely about monitoring those who do use the same right as you use. And in the same time, those who do so and are against your opinion are giving proves for your opinion.

I do share the same thoughts as you and I frankly have to say that many of these aren't likely to be distinguishable from primates with their logical conclusion. But this is the world you're entering when you enter a network of free speech - as long as it's not moderated.

And to be honest: what legitimizes a moderator to judge about postings?
